message:
I used to use gitk as an essential tool with git 
I was very productive and comfortable with it.

now I had to work on mac machine 
after making the configurations necessary to have gitk in my bash.
 
I had a weird problem that after opening it by 30 second it hangs and consume 100% of cpu 
then it returns to normal state and then hangs and so on.

If you can help me please as I didn't find any other tool that can really replace it for me 
I tried gitx and other tools but it's never like gitk "in my opinion"

data.message:
Is it repo specific? Have you tried it with different repos?

Try to run git GC on your repo.

I never used emacs before
Do you have other recommendation
